transcripts.text: So Dr.  Andrew Gaffney went on Fox News and he spoke about Medicare for All.  And this is what happens when you let somebody who knows what they're talking about on Fox News onto Fox News.  This is Fox Business, I should say.  He absolutely obliterated these hosts.
